job_purpose: Join an awesome team at a successful IT service business in Perth, gaining exposure to various security technologies and frameworks.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Monitor security alerts and respond to potential threats
Develop understanding of company's security offerings
Become Subject Matter Expert on key security technologies
Support implementation and management of Microsoft Defender
Assist with 3CX, Sophos, and Microsoft 365 security standards
Support implementation and management of ThreatLocker
Stay updated on security threats and technologies
required_qualifications: 3+ years' experience in IT related role
Basic understanding of security principles and technologies
company_details: A company that values training, career development, team collaboration, and invests in its employees. Promotes diversity and welcomes all qualified applicants.
